Statins are effective cholesterol lowering drugs that act primarily by blocking the 3‐hydroxy‐3‐methyl‐glutaryl‐CoA (HMG‐CoA) reductase enzyme. It was found that statins, particularly pitavastatin, bind strongly to and inhibit the SARS‐CoV‐2 main protease (Mpro), a key coronavirus enzyme, which is a potential drug target.
